## ciliumctl bpf metrics list

List BPF datapath traffic metrics

```
ciliumctl bpf metrics list [flags]
```

### Options

```

  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
```
